AppReporter.FEATURE_HINT: Please provide a short description of your idea. Add any screenshots or visuals that you feel may be important.
AppReporter.ISSUE_HINT: Please provide a brief sentence summarizing the problem e.g. “Cancelling a file copy dialog crashes the file manager” and detailed description of the problem. For example: “I was redirected to an error page after attempting to login with valid credentials”. Include any known steps that may help us reproduce the problem.
